resources.string: Where private messaging meets the safest Bitcoin wallet.
Accounts are required for interpersonal messaging and collaborative wallet features.
Guest mode allows you to create keys and wallets without an account. Please consider the following before using—
Keys and wallets created in guest mode are stored locally. They will not be removed until you manually delete them or uninstall the app.
Messaging and collaborative multisig wallets (*) are currently not available in guest mode.
*A collaborative multisig wallet is a wallet where you co-manage bitcoin with other people.
Quickly create a hot wallet for immediate use and back it up later.
Freely create hot wallets, watch-only wallets, or state-of-the-art multisig wallets that work with a plethora of hardware signing devices. Choose one that fits your need.
For those new to Bitcoin, need expert guidance, or want advanced features like inheritance planning, spending limits, and multi-user wallets.
For those who are comfortable with managing their Bitcoin wallets themselves.
